{{For|the [[Dark Souls II]] variant|Manchettes of Judgment}}
The '''Black Manchette'''s are [[:Category:Dark Souls: Hands Armor|hands armor]] pieces in ''[[Dark Souls]]''. They are part of the [[Black Set]].

{{Description
|First paragraph = Manchette worn by pardoners serving Velka, the Goddess of Sin.
|Second paragraph = The pardoners' attire is uniformly black in color and said to be imbued with Velka's mystical power, which provides resistance against all manner of magic.
}}
==Availability==
Found in the Annex portion of the [[Painted World of Ariamis]], close to [[Vow of Silence]]. Can most easily be accessed after finding the [[Annex Key]], although it is possible to reach it without the key.

==Characteristics==



==Upgrades==
Requires 200 [[souls]] per upgrade.
